summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Mayor or his designee to execute Public Works Trust Fund Loan Agreements with the Washington State Department of Community Development for the Fauntleroy Expressway Crossbeams Project and the South Alaska Street Reconstruction Project; authorizing acceptance of the Public Works Trust Fund proceeds; authorizing preconstruction activities; authorizing the awarding of contracts; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1990 Budget of the Engineering Department by reimbursable appropriation from the Engineering Operating Fund and making an appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund.
